headline: Motorola Solutions, Inc. (MSI): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Motorola Solutions, Inc. (NYSE:MSI) on Twitter by RadnorCapital. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on MSI. Motorola Solutions, Inc. (NYSE:MSI)’s share was trading at $471.31 as of Dec 26th. MSI’s trailing and forward P/E were 51.62 and 31.95 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Motorola Solutions (NYSE:MSI) is […]
